DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect low carbohydrate diet versus high carbohydrate diet weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Low Carbohydrate Diet Versus High Carbohydrate Diet Promoting Weight Loss Improved Health
DOC.detailed_description: The number overweight obese Americans increase significantly recent year . There many different diet plan promote doctor medium . The Atkins diet , low carbohydrate nutritional plan , especially popular ; advocate claim follow diet result long-term weight loss negative effect . Another diet , call Dietary Approaches Stop Hypertension ( DASH ) diet , high carbohydrate diet design help treat prevent high blood pressure . However , thorough investigation claim need . This study compare short- long-term effect Atkins diet ( DASH ) diet . This trial enroll overweight obese participant . This study last 30 month comprise two phase . Participants randomly assign either Atkins DASH diet 30 month . During Phase 1 , participant undergo 6 month weekly group therapy encourage weight loss . Phase 2 weight loss maintenance phase . During Phase 2 , participant monthly meeting therapist weight loss support . Study visit occur study entry Months 3 30 . At study visit , weight measurement , blood urine collection , x-rays occur determine participant ' weight loss , cardiovascular health , kidney function , bone density .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index ( BMI ) 27 50 Fasting glucose less 126 mg/dl Total fast cholesterol le 260 mg/dl Total fast triglyceride le 400 mg/dl Permission primary care provider participate study Normal liver kidney function Willing modify diet health behavior Willing use acceptable method contraception duration study Any medical condition may make weight loss medically inadvisable Weigh 400 lbs History kidney failure Current use 3 blood pressure medication Change blood pressure medication within 3 month prior study entry Diagnosis cardiovascular disease within 6 month prior study entry Cancer diagnosis within 2 year study entry .
